tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE emergency_contacts (
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    relationship VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    emergency_type VARCHAR(50),
    emergency_message TEXT,
    contact_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES emergency_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notification_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_id INT,
  emergency_id INT,
  notification_sent BOOLEAN,
  notification_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE emergencies (
    emergency_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    emergency_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    emergency_description TEXT,
    emergency_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    emergency_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	username STRING NOT NULL,
	email STRING NOT NULL,
	pin INTEGER NOT NULL,
	emergency_contact_id UUID NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (emergency_contact_id) REFERENCES emergency_contacts (contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_events (
	id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id UUID NOT NULL,
	event_id UUID NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (user_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events (event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notification_logs (
	log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id UUID NOT NULL,
	notification_message STRING NOT NULL,
	notification_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (user_id)
);
